item.title: T1 Line as an On Ramp
item.description:
You might know about T1 lines as dedicated connections for digital data or PBX phone lines, but they also serve as excellent access points for various other services. Let’s explore why. Most businesses maintain a Local Area Network (LAN) and a Wide Area Network (WAN) to connect with the wider world. Your WAN connection often acts as an entry point to larger public or private networks. A prime example is “T1 dedicated Internet...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/t1-line-as-an-on-ramp/
